title: Fastest growing area in the country
details:
Bare land for sale.
Only 9 km to Orion City IT Park.
13 km to Colombo port city.
3 km to kelaniya temple.
5.5km to kiribathgoda
675,000 per perch.
15 feet wide road.
6.75 M for 10 perches.
600m from 230 bus route, Kelaniya.
Not in the flood zone. Never flooded.
During flooding season there are plenty of other routes to easily reach to Pettah.
Please email me with your contact details:
